title: Stuck at repairing
body:
Hi guys, i just downloaded league of legends after a long time not playing it, i put the download then when i come back i'm stuck for hours on this 
http://nsa39.casimages.com/img/2018/01/30/180130070632317495.png
how to fix it ?

replies.body: Sometimes that repair can take quite awhile depending on different factors. If it needs to scan the entire installation, it could take as long as it did when you first installed, or longer if your connection isn't quite as fast as it was then. I'd let the repair try and finish, but if it doesn't seem to move at all after hours you could try grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a **clean uninstall and reinstall**. Make sure to run the clean uninstall as well to get rid of any possibly damaged game files.
thanks for wasting my time with that hextech tool, i did it like 10 times and still nothing works lmfao....
